roosevelt churchill and stalin have go on mutual concession agree on almost all count as a result the land where ethnic ukrainians live for century be give to poland in another agreement be sign during the conference which be very important for the soviet side namely an agreement on the repatriation of military and civilian that be displaced person release capture in the territory capture by a number of large population movement be the result of bilateral agreement and have receive the support of international organization such as the league of nations but change begin when the charter of the nuremberg trials of german nazi leader accuse of forced deportation of civilian during the second world war as a war crime and a crime against humanity at the heart of change have be a tendency to take into account human right thereby limit the right of nation state impose decree that affect themwhere be the movement of the population use as a mean of resolve the ethnic conflict today force displacement of the population consider to be a violation of international law denver journal of international law and policy in spring 2001 p116thus although the signatory of the agreement of the yalta and potsdam conference on the eviction of civilian be lawful in accordance with international law of the time the present historian and scholar in the field of international law and human right have revise their evaluation of event and claim that the transfer of population poles and ukrainians in eastern europe should be regard as episode of ethnic cleansing and thus a violation of human farmer dye form starving and who survive be send to gulag siberia most of them be dead by now their real estate land and other property most farms equipment and furniture be give to poland now day they have not receive any compensation neither for property leave in poland or their human right have be take away from them as a human and ukrainian nation no one want help them to get their human right back ethnic ukrainian people have no human right in their life only leave for them to die and disappear from this earth my mother parent be among of them as well as my mother who die in may 2013 could not wait any more for justice one more victim of this crime disappear so as many of them no one compensate my family for this act polish government keep ignore their human right because they be ukrainian nationality not polish only polish nationality can be repatriate back to poland accord to polish law up to now the status of most of the deportee belong to a special category of immigrant luck of housing basic necessity medicine and food be particularly acute affect the first batch of deportee on arrival people be place home of local resident by condense them the purpose of the operation be the use of polish citizen force labor in kolkhoz collective state farm agricultural system of the ussr according to the soviet government document these people be exceptional economic value as free labor the need of socialist totalitarian system just as worker have use force labor in germany for the purpose of national socialist mechanism people previously the owner become slave have to work from dawn to dusk in the soviet state on the boundless collective farm be pay stick workday instead of money and could not move anywhere without document so they could not live the
